Articles.Content:
I successfully landed to mun yesterday and landed today to Minimus, but return didn't work. (Fuel ended) So now I decided to start little project involving mun. I will do mun orbit space station with two reusable landers. I have launched initial station core today and will continue by launching some landers. I will update this thread later.

Rocket standing at launch pad

1st stage dropped and burning towards orbit

We are leaving together - Burn towards the Mun!

Station core in mun orbit

Landers next time!
